Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code to a separate method
Improvements.Description: The method `annotationType()` is repeated three times in the code with the same implementation. This can be extracted to a separate method to reduce redundancy and improve readability.
In the `value()` method of `MetricFormula`, there is an unnecessary else clause. Since you return in the if clause, you can just return "" without the else statement. This can improve readability.
